data.title: Conquest Of The Planet of the Apes (French)
data.meta_description: The Conquest Of The Planet of the Apes original vintage poster at Printed Originals. This original French release poster is from the 1973 release of the film.
data.text:
Description

Loosely based on Pierre Boulle's 1963 French novel, "Planet of the Apes" was first adapted for the screen in 1968, and has gone on to spawn 4 direct sequels, along with further features in the 21st century.

The highly successful original series was produced by Arthur P. Jacobs, and this stunning original 1973 French release of the film marks the fourth feature in the series.

Framing Options

Framed posters come with a timeless made to measure custom frame available in black, white or natural oak colour. Each frame is made from high quality solid oak and the artwork is available to be framed with or without a surrounding white mount to make the poster stand out even more. Our frames are custom built to order in our UK workshop, and so we work to 7-14 working days lead time for dispatch. Please note that due to their custom nature, frames are non-refundable with the exception of if they are damaged or incorrect. The frame size is the size of the poster plus an additional 70mm on each side if including a mount.

Frame

20mm wide x 33mm Deep Solid Oak Frame, Open Grain, Paint Finish

Mount Style

Single Smooth White Mount White Core (50mm width)

Glazing

Acrylic Safety Glazing

Accessories

Wall Hanging Fixtures

Unframed posters are shipped to the UK next day courier delivery free of charge. Framed posters can take up to 14 working days for dispatch for the frame to be built and poster to be framed. Frames are packaged and securely padded in a purpose built reinforced cardboard box. Unframed posters are packaged and securely padded in a purpose built reinforced cardboard tube.

International shipping for unframed posters is £25 . International shipping for framed posters is a charge of £125 as a flat rate up to US One-Sheet (27 x 40”) size
